snippet: One factor has condemned the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway to a place of longstanding infamy in the New York metropolitan area, if not all of urban America: construction that never seems to end.
abstract: New York City's Transportation Dept has been unable to find long-term solutions for the chronic traffic woes of the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway, the age and structure of which necessitate constant emergency repairs and extended reconstruction projects; repairs began in 1960 and are still a permanent feature of the deteriorating landscape for drivers.
lead_paragraph: One factor has condemned the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway to a place of longstanding infamy in the New York metropolitan area, if not all of urban America: construction that never seems to end.

headline.seo: On the B.Q.E., Road Work Ahead, Forever
